X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

number.description: The invoice number - is a unique alpha numeric number per invoice per company

po_number.description: The purchase order associated with this invoice

public_notes.description: The public notes of the invoice

private_notes.description: The private notes of the invoice

total_taxes.description: The total taxes for the invoice

line_items.description: An array of objects which define the line items of the invoice

quantity.description: The quantity of the product offered for this line item

cost.description: The cost of the product offered for this line item

product_key.description: The product key of the product offered for this line item (Referred to as Product in the product tab)

product_cost.description: The cost of the product offered for this line item (Referred to as Cost in the product tab)

notes.description: The notes/description for the product offered for this line item

discount.description: The discount applied to the product offered for this line item

is_amount_discount.description: Indicates whether the discount applied to the product offered for this line item is a fixed amount or a percentage

tax_name1.description: The name of the first tax applied to the product offered for this line item

tax_rate1.description: The rate of the first tax applied to the product offered for this line item

tax_name2.description: The name of the second tax applied to the product offered for this line item

tax_rate2.description: The rate of the second tax applied to the product offered for this line item

tax_name3.description: The name of the third tax applied to the product offered for this line item

tax_rate3.description: The rate of the third tax applied to the product offered for this line item

line_total.description: The total amount of the product offered for this line item

gross_line_total.description: The total amount of the product offered for this line item before discounts

tax_amount.description: The total amount of tax applied to the product offered for this line item

custom_value1.description: The first custom value of the product offered for this line item

custom_value2.description: The second custom value of the product offered for this line item

custom_value3.description: The third custom value of the product offered for this line item

custom_value4.description: The fourth custom value of the product offered for this line item

type_id.description: 1 = product, 2 = service, 3 unpaid gateway fee, 4 paid gateway fee, 5 late fee, 6 expense

tax_id.description: The tax ID of the product: 1 product, 2 service, 3 digital, 4 shipping, 5 exempt, 5 reduced tax, 7 override, 8 zero rate, 9 reverse tax

invitations.description: An array of objects which define the invitations of the invoice

paid_to_date.description: The amount paid on the invoice to date

discount.description: The invoice discount, can be an amount or a percentage

is_amount_discount.description: Flag determining if the discount is an amount or a percentage

is_deleted.description: Defines if the invoice has been deleted

uses_inclusive_taxes.description: Defines the type of taxes used as either inclusive or exclusive

last_sent_date.description: The last date the invoice was sent out

next_send_date.description: The Next date for a reminder to be sent

partial_due_date.description: The due date for the deposit/partial amount

due_date.description: The due date of the invoice

custom_surcharge_tax1.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_tax2.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_tax3.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_tax4.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

project_id.description: The project associated with this invoice

auto_bill_tries.description: The number of times the invoice has attempted to be auto billed

auto_bill_enabled.description: Boolean flag determining if the invoice is set to auto bill

subscription_id.description: The subscription associated with this invoice

location_id.description: The client location id that this invoice relates to

design_id.description: The unique identifier of the design template used for this invoice

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate used for currency conversion

vendor_id.description: The unique identifier of the vendor associated with this invoice

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
